definition: to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around

sentences.english: A hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一个乡下人第一次到大城市游逛。

sentences.english: He has the habit of bumming about in the street.
sentences.chinese: 他养成了在大街上游逛的习惯。

sentences.english: New DiscoveryA hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一个乡下人第一次到大城市游逛。

sentences.english: After five years, he returned from his wanderings.
sentences.chinese: 他在外游逛五年后又回来了。

sentences.english: The mall has become the number one hang-out place for teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 这个购物中心已经成为青少年出外游逛的首选之地。

sentences.english: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

sentences.english: The boy was running around with a chip on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩东奔西跑，到处游逛，摆出一副好斗的姿态。

sentences.english: She's swanning around Europe for the summer.
sentences.chinese: 她一个夏天在欧洲游逛。

sentences.english: New Discovery A hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 新发现一个乡下人第一次到大城市游逛。

sentences.english: Daughter Maria took us around yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天女儿玛利亚带我们四周游逛。

sentences.english: It meant that waking up and exploring on Saturday morning was all the more exciting.
sentences.chinese: 但这也使星期六早上醒来到外面游逛更有兴奋感。

sentences.english: If you see Andy on your travels about town, tell him to ring me.
sentences.chinese: 你在城里游逛时要是遇到安迪，告诉他给我打个电话。

sentences.english: She spent the summer swanning around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 她一个夏天在欧洲游逛。

sentences.english: Except for the moose wandering down the road.
sentences.chinese: 除了你可以看到麋鹿在马路上游逛。

definition: to stroll/to go for a walk
to roam around/to have a stroll
to roll/to wander around/to appear repeatedly
to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave)/to linger on
to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around
